Well hiya, kid! I’m Joe! Welcome to the team!
Not alotta time for chit-chat now...let's get you out in your ship, the Sentinel 9000!
Tap and drag to rotate the ship.
A big part of your job is to clean up debris, meaning any coins you see floatin’ around.
You’re gonna wanna clean all that up simply by tapping on it.
Tap on gold scrap to collect.
Hot bag o' juice! Now you’ve got enough coins for a Gizmoid!
Lemme go ahead and create a blade for ya’ to hold it.
Now I want you to meet my Gizmoid friend, Toasty!
He fires atomically-infused pieces of toast.
Tap and drag Toasty to a Blade to construct it.
NOW you’re gettin’ it! Way to go!
Toasty comes in handy when ya' wanna blow somethin' up.
Somethin' like a big asteroid that's comin' right for ya!
Aaaah, jeebuz! Careful now! You're headin' right into an asteroid field!
Drag another Toasty on top of the current one to stack them.
